summary: This bill, the "Scheduling Tianeptine and Analogues Now to Defend Against Emerging Opioids Act" (STAND Against Emerging Opioids Act), proposes to amend the Controlled Substances Act. It aims to schedule tianeptine, including its analogues, salts, and isomers, as a Schedule III substance. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives and referred to committees on Energy and Commerce, and the Judiciary. The scheduling would become effective 90 days after the bill's enactment.
